author: ALICE FUNG and ANIRUDDHA GHOSAL
title: Hong Kong's success in fending off COVID comes back to haunt
description: HONG KONG (AP) — For two years, Hong Kong successfully insulated most of its residents from COVID-19 and often went months without a single locally spread case. Then the omicron variant showed up.The fast-spreading mutation breached Hong Kong’s defenses and h…
